item.title: â€¦and the home of the brave!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "Southwest Airlines passenger Lorrie Heasley was wearing a T-shirt with a picture of Bush, Cheney, and Rice that bore the caption "Meet the Fuckers." Other passengers, gravely offended, tattled on her and Southwest Officials kicked her off the flight." Read the whole article.
